attributes.action: sack the social workers from Haringey Council who failed to miss the signs that led to the death of 'Baby P'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'Baby P' died of a catalogue of injuries after social workers missed more than 60 chances to remove him from his abusive family. 
Even after the conviction of 'Baby P's' mother, lover and lodger, council bosses have insisted that nobody be sacked over this.

Sharon Shoesmith (who is the chairwoman of Haringey's Local Safeguarding Children board has even refused to apologise to the baby's biological father.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
